reviewText: I got my library to buy this new staging and was very happy with it. It is very authentic - a line by line translation of the original.  I am struck by the incredible irony of how little things change and how this ancient drama speaks to the situation in any modern day dictatorship. e.g. Russian under Putin. Putin is Zeus - Prometheus is the access of knowledge released by the internet, and the chorus of singing daughters of Oceanus are Pussy Riot. Io is played by Tanya Rodina (Miss Ukraine) who sings in a ridiculous cow-spotted bikini ... okay. this didn't work so well but I loved it anyway.
